en.question:
<p>What will come in the place of the question mark (?) in the following equation, if &#39;+&#39; and &#39;-&#39; are interchanged and &#39;&times;&#39; and &#39;&divide;&#39; are interchanged?</p>

<p>19 + 55 &times; 5 - 7 &divide; 3 = ?</p>

<p>A paper is folded and punched as shown below. How will it appear when unfolded?</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/25/12/IMG-1959-Arpit-86E..png" style="width: 232px; height: 72px;" /></p>

<p>A dice has its faces marked by letters C, L, A, U, T and E. Two positions of the same dice are shown in the given figures. Which face is opposite to face A?</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/25/12/IMG-1959-Arpit-63E.png" style="width: 223px; height: 97px;" /></p>

Seven people A, B, C, D, E, F and G are sitting in a straight line facing the north(but not necessarily in the same order). G and C are sitting at the ends of the line not necessarily in the same order. F is sitting to the immediate right of G and the immediate left of D. E is sitting to the immediate right of D. A is sitting second to the right of E. B is sitting second to the left of C. Who is sitting between B and C?

<p>Select the Venn diagram that best illustrates the relationship between the following classes.</p>

<p>Married, Women, Doctors</p>

<p>What should come in place of the question mark (?) in the given series based on the English alphabetical order?</p>

<p>GID KMH OQL SUP ?</p>

questions.topicName: Coding and Decoding By Letter Shifting

en.question: DSXL is related to FUZN in a certain way based on the English alphabetical order. In the same way, GMUB is related to IOWD. To which of the following is TFON related, following the same logic?

Based on the English alphabetical order, three of the following four letter-clusters are alike in a certain way and thus form a group. Which letter-cluster DOES NOT belong to that group?<br />
(Note: The odd one out is not based on the number of consonants/vowels or their position in the letter-cluster.)

<p>Select the option that represents the letters that, when sequentially placed from left to right in the blanks below, will complete the letter series.</p>

<p>A _ _ F D _ S G F _ A _ _ F D A S _ _ D</p>
The position(s) of how many letters will remain unchanged if each letter in the word SCRAMBLE is arranged in the English alphabetical order?
In a certain code language, &#39;WEDS&#39; is coded as &#39;3&#39; and &#39;MAIUFQX&#39; is coded as &#39;6&#39;. How is &#39;GIQRBZLA&#39; coded in the given language?

<p>What should come in place of the question mark (?) in the given series?</p>

<p>878 880 884 890 898 ?</p>

<p>Select the option figure in which the given figure (X) is embedded as its part (rotation is NOT allowed).</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/25/12/IMG-1959-Arpit-38E.png" style="width: 65px; height: 97px;" /></p>

<p>What should come in place of the question mark (?) in the given series?</p>

<p>83 95 108 122 137 ?&nbsp;</p>
In a certain code language, &#39;MRGF&#39; is coded as &#39;15-20-9-8&#39; and &#39;YDXB&#39; is coded as &#39;27-6-26-4&#39;. What is the code for &#39;JWAS&#39; in the given code language?

questions.topicName: Coding and Decoding By Letter Shifting

en.question: DKSO is related to CIPK in a certain way based on the English alphabetical order. In the same way, LAPZ is related to KYMV. To which of the given options is EYGN related, following the same logic?

<p>Identify the figure given in the options, which when put in place of the question mark (?) will logically complete the series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//cdn.testbook.com/images/production/quesImages/qImage67d8d77dbd32a29b994376b1.png" /></p>
The Attorney General of India provides legal advice to _________.
According to Census 2011, in which State is the difference in the male and female literacy rates the highest?
According to the Vishnu Purana, who was Chandragupta Maurya&#39;s mother?

options.value: The wife of a Nanda king

en.question: As per Census 2011, which of the following northern states has the highest literacy rate?
The Union Cabinet chaired by Prime Minister, approved which scheme to promote sustainable agriculture and to achieve food security for self sufficiency in October 2024?

options.value: National Mission on Agricultural Extension and Technology
National Mission on Oilseeds and Oil Palm

en.question: Padmashree Mukund Nayak was honoured with the Sangeet Natak Akademi Award 2017 for which of the following categories?
In which month does the Rann Utsav start at Kachchh, Gujarat?
What was the pre-determined principle announced in the Union Budget for 2018-19 regarding the Minimum Support Price (MSP) for the principal crops in India?

options.value: Equal to the cost of production
One-and-a-half times the cost of production
50 per cent less than the cost of production

en.question: When was the First Five-Year Plan launched in India?
In which sport does the &quot;Timed Out&quot; rule apply?
87-year-old Ramlal Bareth, the only surviving Kathak Dancer of Raigarh court, was awarded with which of the following awards in 2024?
Which of the following was a new agricultural practice introduced during the Green Revolution?
The increased concentration of suspended solids in water and their accumulation on bottoms where they are undesirable, creates what kind of water pollution?
The President of India, Droupadi Murmu, was previously the Governor of _______.
Which law is Willebrod Snell&#39;s most important contribution to science?
Which of the following generally form at the upper part of a river?
Which classical dance form originated in Kuchelapuram village of Krishna district?
The Government of India Act, 1935 provided for how many lists of divisions of power between the federation (central government) and provinces?
What is the standard width of the field in an international hockey match?
The Quit India Resolution was passed during which session of the Indian National Congress?
A dealer marks 20% above the cost price and allows a 20% discount. What is the profit or loss per cent?
A shopkeeper bought an article for ‚Çπ500. At what price (in ‚Çπ) should he sell the article to make 28% profit?
Divide ‚Çπ4,800 among Ram, Shyam and Kartik in the ratio of 4 : 8 : 3. Find the amount received by Shyam.

Mahesh has ‚Çπ1617 with him. He divided it amongst his sons Vijay and Ajay and asked them to invest it at 10% rate of interest compounded annually. It was seen that Vijay and Ajay got same amount after 15 and 16 years respectively. How much (in ‚Çπ) did Mahesh give to Vijay?

To do a certain task, A and B work alternately on alternate days, with B starting on the first day. A alone can complete the task in 22 days. If the work is completed in&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(11 \frac{1}{2}\)</span>&nbsp;days, then in how many days will B alone complete the &nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{3}{4}\)</span>&nbsp;part of the original&nbsp;task?
What will be the volume (V) of the cuboid, if its length is doubled, height is halved and breadth is tripled?

Two trains having lengths of 170 m and 480 m are running at speeds of 70 km/h and 80 km/h, respectively, in the same direction. The time taken (in minutes) by the faster train, coming from behind, to completely cross the other train is:

Manoj has ‚Çπ1612 with him. He divided it amongst his sons Anand and Anil and asked them to invest it at 8% rate of interest compounded annually. It was seen that Anand and Anil got same amount after 13 and 14 years respectively. How much (in ‚Çπ) did Manoj give to Anand?
Find the value of <span class="math-tex">\(\left[(91 \div 7) \times\left\{\frac{64}{4}+\frac{17}{6} \times(8-2)\right\}\right]\)</span>

A and B are two stations 370 km apart. A train starts from station A at 9:00 A.M. and travels towards station B at a speed of 20 km/hr. Another train starts from station B at 10:00 A.M. and travels towards station A at a speed of 50 km per/ hr. At what time do they meet?
The average weight of Anwar, Amit and Gopal is 45 kg. If the average weight of Anwar and Amit be 43 kg and that of Amit and Gopal be 42 kg, then the weight of Amit (in kg ) is:

If F1 and F2 are the fourth proportional to&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{2}{7}, \frac{7}{12}, 8\)</span>&nbsp;and&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{5}{6}, \frac{4}{3}, 10\)</span>&nbsp;, respectively, then what is F1 : F2?
The average age of 30 students in a group is 18 years. When the teacher&#39;s age is included, the average age of the group increases by 1 year. What is the teacher&#39;s age (in years)?
Evaluate: 32 &divide; 8 &times; 3 - 3 &times; 3
A dishonest shopkeeper promises to sell his goods at cost price. However, he uses a weight that actually weighs 21% less than what is written on it. Find his profit percentage.
LCM and HCF of two numbers are 168 and 6 respectively. If one of the numbers is 24, then find the other number.
The population of a district is 369000, out of which 186000 are males. 45% of the population is literate. If 45% males are literate, then what percentage of females are literate?

Amit invests a sum of ‚Çπ5400 and Gopal invests a sum of ‚Çπ9400 at the same rate of simple interest per annum. If, at the end of 6 years, Gopal gets ‚Çπ960 more interest than Amit, then find the rate of interest per annum (in percentage).
Find the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\left[(44 \div 4) \times\left\{\frac{48}{8}+\frac{21}{5} \times(7-2)\right\}\right]\)</span>

The price of a shirt is first increased by 15% and then decreased by 12%, and again increased by 8%. Find the net increase or decrease percentage (correct to one decimal place) in the price of the shirt.

<p>Select the option that best defines the given word.</p>

<p>Apportion</p>
Identify the sentence with the INCORRECT usage of adverb.

options.value: Mohan could barely make out the distant figure.
Mohan could make out barely the distant figure.
Mohan could often make out the distant figure.
Mohan could usually make out the distant figure.

en.question:
<p>Parts of the following sentence have been given as options. Select the option that contains an error.</p>

<p>&#39;The rain fell heavy and caused flooding in the streets&#39;.</p>

<p>Select the most appropriate option that can substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence.</p>

<p>Each of the two farmers wants the certified seeds <u>but neither have any papers.</u></p>

<p>Select the most appropriate idiom that can substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence.</p>

<p>Her explanation was so convoluted that it left everyone <u>confused.</u></p>

<p>Select the most appropriate idiom to substitute the underlined phrase in the given sentence.</p>

<p>When it comes to negotiations, he knows how to <u>act in a way that maximises his advantages</u> and get the best deal.</p>

<p>Select the most appropriate synonym of the highlighted word.</p>

<p>You need to have at least a <u><strong>rudimentary</strong></u> understanding of technology before you can upload a video on website.</p>

<p>Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.</p>

<p>Dodge</p>

<p>Select the word that best completes the given sentence. Determine the collocation through the sentence.</p>

<p>Santra took a deep breath before __________&nbsp;onto the stage to deliver her speech.</p>

<p>Select the most appropriate idiom that refers to the underlined segment in the given sentence.</p>

<p>The agents are <u>struck in a difficult circumstance with no escape at all.</u></p>

options.value: To give one a long rope

en.question:
<p>Identify the INCORRECTLY spelt word in the given sentence.</p>

<p>The report was filled with spurious data and ambigous conclusions, making it untenable to rely on.</p>

<p>Select the most appropriate word segment that rectifies the bracketed word segment and complete the given sentence meaningfully.</p>

<p>It took quite (few some time) to finish the project.</p>

<p>Select the INCORRECTLY spelt word in the following sentence.</p>

<p>&quot;I can&#39;t believe I recieved such a beautiful gift.&quot;</p>

<p>Fill in the blank with the most appropriate synonym of the word in brackets in the following sentence.</p>

<p>In that case, a gentle chemical peel from a dermatologist may __________ up (hasten) improvement.</p>

<p>Select the appropriate ANTONYM of the given word.</p>

<p>Opaque</p>
Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank no. 1.
Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank no. 2.
Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank no. 3.
Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank no. 4.
Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank no. 5.
